Abstract: Central Park's many New Year's Eve celebrations include a five kilometer footrace (M)
Snippet: Central Park's many New Year's Eve celebrations include a five kilometer footrace (M)
LeadParagraph: Some came in tuxedos, others dressed as dragons, Santa Claus or Father Time. There were butterflies, famous buildings, and -- for reasons not entirely obvious -- make-believe waiters. They came to the annual Midnight Run at Central Park to race, jog and, in some cases, stumble into a new year.

Headline.Main: Brisk Race in the Park At the Midnight Hour
Headline.PrintHeadline: 1/1/00: A PEACEFUL PARTY; Brisk Race in the Park At the Midnight Hour
